AcidSpray.NAME: Acid Spray
AcidSpray.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy; or deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

AntimatterBomb.NAME: Antimatter Bomb
AntimatterBomb.DESCRIPTION: Apply a Bomb that deals !M! damage in 3 turns.

AssemblyLine.NAME: Assembly Line
AssemblyLine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn choose and shuffle a Trinket into your draw pile.

AutoStrike.NAME: Auto-Strike
AutoStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When drawn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Automate.NAME: Automate
Automate.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you play a card, spend 1 Fuel to play it twice.

Bayonet.NAME: Bayonet
Bayonet.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Deal !D! damage; or spend 2 Fuel to deal !D! damage !M! times.

BandageBot.NAME: Bandage Bot
BandageBot.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take attack damage, shuffle a Tasty Trinket into your draw pile.

Bombardment.NAME: Bombardment
Bombardment.DESCRIPTION: Apply a Bomb to ALL enemies that deals !M! damage in 3 turns, and again in 6 turns. Exhaust.

Booster.NAME: Booster
Booster.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Fuel. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

BoxOfScraps.NAME: Box of Scraps
BoxOfScraps.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle up to !M! trinkets into your draw pile. Draw !M! cards.

CaptureMomentum.NAME: Capture Momentum
CaptureMomentum.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever an attack would deal damage, instead apply a Bomb that deals double that damage in 3 turns.
CaptureMomentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever an attack would deal damage, instead apply a Bomb that deals triple that damage in 3 turns.

DEPRECATED_ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
DEPRECATED_ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Spend !M! Fuel to gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

ClockworkAssistant.NAME: Clockwork Assistant
ClockworkAssistant.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a card and play it.

CloneVats.NAME: Clone Vats
CloneVats.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may copy a card in your hand.

ComputeTrajectory.NAME: Compute Trajectory
ComputeTrajectory.DESCRIPTION: Move any number of cards from your draw pile to your discard pile.

DataRecorder.NAME: Data Recorder
DataRecorder.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Strength, gain 1 Strength.

Detonate.NAME: Detonate
Detonate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Detonate enemy's Bombs.
Detonate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage equal to the enemy's Bombs.

DEPRECATED_EmergencyRepair.NAME: Emergency Repair
DEPRECATED_EmergencyRepair.DESCRIPTION: Restore all HP lost last turn. Exhaust.

ExhaustVents.NAME: Exhaust Vents
ExhaustVents.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend Fuel, apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

ExploreOptions.NAME: Explore Options
ExploreOptions.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When drawn gain !B! Block.

ExtractOil.NAME: Extract Oil
ExtractOil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This turn, when you play an Attack, gain 1 Fuel.

FlamableWall.NAME: Flamable Wall
FlamableWall.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Spend 1 Fuel to gain !B! Block; or gain !M! Fuel.

FlameCannon.NAME: Flame Cannon
FlameCannon.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

FlameThrower.NAME: Flame Thrower
FlameThrower.DESCRIPTION: Spend all Fuel. NL Deal !D! damage for each Fuel spent.

FlexibleSpear.NAME: Flexible Spear
FlexibleSpear.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Deal !D! damage, apply !M! Weak; or deal !D! damage, apply !M! Vulnerable.

FragmentationGrenade.NAME: Fragmentation Grenade
FragmentationGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Shuffle up to !M! Trinkets into your draw pile.

FumeBlast.NAME: Fume Blast
FumeBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Costs 1 less for each Fuel spent this combat.

FumeHood.NAME: Fume Hood
FumeHood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, gain 1 Fuel.

DEPRECATED_GarbageDisposalCannon.NAME: Garbage Disposal
DEPRECATED_GarbageDisposalCannon.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

GatherParts.NAME: Gather Parts
GatherParts.DESCRIPTION: Place all Trinkets from your draw pile into your hand. NL Shuffle !M! random Trinkets into your draw pile. Exhaust.
GatherParts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place all Trinkets from your draw pile into your hand. NL Shuffle !M! random Trinkets into your draw pile.

Generator.NAME: Generator
Generator.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, spend 1 Fuel to gain [R].

GattlingGun.NAME: Machine Gun
GattlingGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Fuel you have.

GlassCannon.NAME: Glass Cannon
GlassCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. When drawn increase this card's number of attacks. Exhaust.

GoldenGun.NAME: Golden Gun
GoldenGun.DESCRIPTION: Spend !M! gold. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

HideBehindJunk.NAME: Hide Behind Junk
HideBehindJunk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Shuffle a random Trinket into your draw pile.
HideBehindJunk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Shuffle !M! random Trinkets into your draw pile.

ImposingConstruct.NAME: Imposing Construct
ImposingConstruct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. When drawn apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

Jetpack.NAME: Jetpack
Jetpack.DESCRIPTION: Spent 1 fuel at the start of each turn. Reduce incomming damage by 50%.

JunkLaser.NAME: Junk Laser
JunkLaser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals an additional !M! damage for ALL of your 0 cost cards.

LabAccident.NAME: Lab Accident
LabAccident.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in your hand. Add !M! random cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.
LabAccident.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in your hand. Add !M! random upgraded cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

LightOnFire.NAME: LightOnFire
LightOnFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This turn, whenever you spend Fuel deal !M! damage.
LightOnFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This and next turn, whenever you spend Fuel deal !M! damage.

Liquify.NAME: Liquify
Liquify.DESCRIPTION: Choose and Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand, gain 1 Fuel for each card exhausted. NL Exhaust.

MechanicalClaw.NAME: Mechanical Claw
MechanicalClaw.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 fuel. Deal !D! damage. Draw a card.

Mechanize.NAME: Mechanize
Mechanize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Fuel. Cards in your hand cost Fuel instead of energy this turn until played.

MindControlBeam.NAME: Mind Control Beam
MindControlBeam.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. Enemy changes their intent.

NowOrNever.NAME: Now or Never
NowOrNever.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Gain !B! Block; or gain !M! Block next turn.

ParticleBeam.NAME: Particle Beam
ParticleBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Choose: Draw !M! cards; or draw !M! cards next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Draw !M! cards next turn.

Browse.NAME: Browse
Browse.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

SpamFilter.NAME: Spam Filter
SpamFilter.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, put up to !M! cards from your draw pile into your discard pile.

PneumaticHammer.NAME: PneumaticHammer
PneumaticHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Fuel X times. Gain X Fuel.
PneumaticHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Fuel X+1 times. Gain X+1 Fuel.

Poke.NAME: Poke
Poke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw cards until you draw a 0 cost card, discard the others.

PortablePumpjack.NAME: Portable Pumpjack
PortablePumpjack.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn gain !M! Fuel.

Postpone.NAME: Postpone
Postpone.DESCRIPTION: Place this and any cards from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL When drawn, draw !M! card.
Postpone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place this and any cards from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL When drawn, draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose cards to place on top of your draw pile.

PowerArmor.NAME: Power Armor
PowerArmor.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each Fuel you have.

Probe.NAME: Probe
Probe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. You may discard and upgrade any of them.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose cards to discard and upgrade.

Reconstitute.NAME: Reconstitute
Reconstitute.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn gain !M! Fuel for each Fuel spent this turn.

RecyclingStation.NAME: Recycling Station
RecyclingStation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Trinket, draw a card.
RecyclingStation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! random Trinkets into your draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a Trinket, draw a card.

Redesign.NAME: Redesign
Redesign.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand and discard them. Draw !M! cards.

Refuel.NAME: Refuel
Refuel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Fuel. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

SelfDestruct.NAME: Self Destruct
SelfDestruct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to yourself, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

ShrinkRay.NAME: Shrink Ray
ShrinkRay.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength, it regains 1 Strength per turn. Exhaust.

SoftenUp.NAME: Soften Up
SoftenUp.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. Deal !D! damage. Your next attack this turn deals double damage.

Sprocket.NAME: Sprocket
Sprocket.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. Exhaust. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

StickSharpener.NAME: Stick Sharpener
StickSharpener.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw, if you have drawn more than 5, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Strafe.NAME: Strafe
Strafe.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! block.

ThrowScraps.NAME: Throw Scraps
ThrowScraps.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, shuffle a random Trinket into your draw pile.

Tinker.NAME: Tinker
Tinker.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and upgrade it.
Tinker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and upgrade it. NL It costs 1 less this turn.

Tune.NAME: Tune
Tune.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Gain !M! Strength and lose !M! Dexterity; or gain !M! Dexterity and lose !M! Strength.
Tune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose: Gain !M! Strength and lose !M! Dexterity; or gain !M! Dexterity and lose !M! Strength.

Virus.NAME: Virus
Virus.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of Virus cards in your deck. Add a copy of this to your discard pile.
Virus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of Virus cards in your deck. Add !M! copies of this to your discard pile.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Trinkets to shuffle into your draw pile.

FoldedTrinket.NAME: Folded Trinket
FoldedTrinket.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, discard one of them.
FoldedTrinket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, discard all but one of them.

RecycledTrinket.NAME: Recycled Trinket
RecycledTrinket.DESCRIPTION: Return the top card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
RecycledTrinket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
